descriptionHtml:
[center]



[b]Introduction
============[/b]

Once there was an assassin, his name was Arkanfel.

A member of the Dark Brotherhood and for his crimes committed against his own he was banished to a remote point in Skyrim, never to leave unless called by the Night Mother herself. Years have passed and he felt all but forgotten, until he woke from a most disturbing dream one night.

The Exile has been called, and he has left for one final contract.

His home and everything within has been left behind, and is open to anyone willing to make the journey to claim it.

The Exiles Tower awaits.


[b]Description
===========[/b]

Name: The Exile's Tower.

A small single person dwelling.

Home Includes:

~ Bedroom
~ Storage (Multiple, various)
~ Alchemy, Enchanting areas
~ Cooking pot
~ Forge, Grind wheel, Workbench and tanning areas
~ Armour mannequin and weapon displays/racks

There is also an artifact display present within the tower, it does not cover all items, but I felt it was a nice addition.

There are multiple and various storage areas and containers within the home,
identfiable by their name when you hover the mouse over them.

Weapon racks, bookshelves, armour storage, food stores etc... Plus a few other misc storage items.

Many of the items are fixed in place to prevent clutter flying around the
cell, but not everything. I have made efforts to avoid placing anything
moveable in areas that are likely to result in them being knocked down
or shifted by a passing player.


[b]Location
========[/b]

Arcwind Point.

The home has it's own map marker - status: always activated.

This means you can fast travel to it from first installation if you so wish. The marker is visible around the Arcwind Point area, it's a tower ruin marker.

Image of the location on the map is included in this download.

Location notes:

As with my (and many other home) mods - you may encounter creatures or enemies outside, this is something I did not encounter myself during my building and testing, but I am aware that any mod that adds additional creatures, combat zones or similar mods can increase the chance of such encounters, I hope it does not become an issue for people, but I felt people should be aware it might happen.


[b]Requirements:
============[/b]

The official update ESM, and the officla DLC: Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn.


[b]Install
=======[/b]

1. Copy the .esp file and BSA to *Steam installation path*\Skyrim\Data\
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

NMM users: Load NMM launcher, place a checkmark beside the .esp file.


[b]Uninstall
=========[/b]

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp file from \Skyrim\Data\

NMM users:

1. Start NMM Launcher, uncheck the .esp file.
2.Delete the .esp file and BSA from \Skyrim\Data\

[b]Known Issues or Bugs
====================
[/b]
Bugs:

Nothing at the moment that I recognize.
If anyone using this mod discovers something that they believe is a mod
error or conflict, I'd appreciate any feedback on the issue.

Issues:


The light levels and look of the cabin may vary depending on what mods you use.
This I cannot be held accountable for, so if the home is too bright or too dark, then it's due to the mod you have.
It looks fine and as I want in in my game, so I'm happy enough to leave it as it is.


[b]Updates
=======[/b]

I may add some more content to this one.
It started off as something to pass the time, so it does not contain the usual level of thought I usually put into my works.


[b]Contact
=======[/b]

You can find me on the NexusMods site as 'The Vampire Dante'.


[b]Tools Used
==========[/b]

Skyrim Creation Kit by Bethesda Softworks.
7-Zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[b]
Licensing/Legal
===============[/b]

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of this mod.
This file is only available from myself directly, or via the Nexus site at this time.
Downloads made from any other sites have not been approved by myself and should not be used.[/center]
author: The Vampire Dante
